excerpt: "The ability to predict outcomes in sports is the mythical pot of gold, the unicorn, the fountain of youth. And everyone on the periphery of sports, from team-hired stats geeks to physical trainers to Vegas oddsmakers, has a vested interest in gaining an edge on the predictability of the next outcome."
